titles.title: Expressing the importance of the United States alliance with the Republic of Korea and the contributions of Korean Americans in the United States.
Expressing the importance of the United States alliance with the Republic of Korea and the contributions of Korean Americans in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Rule of law and government transparency
Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the importance of the U.S.-Republic of Korea alliance in promoting peace and security in the Indo-Pacific region and calls for further strengthening of ties between the countries.
